abstract: Voters seem to have grown weary of Mr. Bloomberg as he enters the home stretch of his tenure, a new poll finds.
snippet: Voters seem to have grown weary of Mr. Bloomberg as he enters the home stretch of his tenure, a new poll finds.
lead_paragraph: A narrow majority of New York City voters believe that Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg has lost his focus midway through his third term, according to a poll released Wednesday morning by Quinnipiac University.

headline.main: Poll Finds Some Believe Mayor Has Lost Focus
